scripts.deploy:docker: npx mustache config/docker.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 --node http://graph-node:8020/
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npx mustache config/sepolia.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:ethereum: npx mustache config/ethereum.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph deploy venusprotocol/crosschain-governance --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
